name: SpaceXplorer (itch)
description:
This is an endless shoot 'em all shooting game. We control a spaceship and shoot asteroids as much as possible. To move the spaceship or shot the asteroid, just click on the game screen.

You'll get +10 score for every asteroid you've shot.  Spaceship's shield will be decreased every time hit an asteroid. If shield is zero, the game is over.

Credit:
(BG Music: Stealth Mode from PlayOnLoop) https://www.playonloop.com/2015-music-loops/stealth-mode/
